name: triage-flow-care
description: TriageFlow Care is a medical triage system app designed to assist healthcare professionals in prioritizing and managing patient care efficiently.
author: Clyde Villacrusis and Alicia Yu

scripts.start:all: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend" "npm run start:electron"
scripts.check-size: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function getSize(dir){let size=0;const files=fs.readdirSync(dir);files.forEach(file=>{const filePath=path.join(dir,file);if(fs.statSync(filePath).isDirectory()&&!['node_modules','.git','dist','.next'].includes(file)){size+=getSize(filePath)}else if(fs.statSync(filePath).isFile()&&!file.match(/\.(log|exe|asar|pack)$/)){size+=fs.statSync(filePath).size}});return size}const size=Math.round(getSize('.')/1024/1024*100)/100;console.log(`ðŸ“¦ Deployable size: ${size} MB`);console.log(size<100?'âœ… OK for Vercel':'âŒ Too large for Vercel');"
